quotes.quote: He'll get tired of chasing someone who doesn't chase back!
He who chases two rabbits, catches none.
Chasing money to please society.
Chase after the truth like all hell and you'll free yourself, even though you never touch its coat-tails.
Don't waste your time chasing things that will never be beneficial to your future.
There's always something funny about men chasing women.
Chasing a person doesn't give you value or build values in you. You earn your value by chasing morality and practicing dignity.
The way of the consumerist culture is to spend so much energy chasing happiness that it has none left to be happy.
If you chase perfection, you often catch excellence.
Chase excellence, success will follow.
Chase away sorrow by living.
Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks.
Don't chase people. Be yourself, do your own thing and work hard.
Chase your passion, not your pension.
Two things you will never have to chase: True friends & true love.
You will never find time for anything. You must make it.
If you chase something too desperately, it eludes you.
Never chase love, affection, or attention. If it isn't given freely by another person, it isn't worth having.
A man is like a cat; chase him and he will run - sit still and ignore him and he'll come purring at your feet.
Never chase a lie. Let it alone, and it will run itself to death.
It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams.
Enthusiasm is the mother of effort, and without it nothing great was ever achieved.
Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
People are chasing cash, not happiness. When you chase money, you're going to lose. You're just going to. Even if you get the money, you're not going to be happy.
If you're spending your entire early 20s chasing the next party,what are you running away from?
Once in a while it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told.
Chasing profits and building a long-term profit model are two different things.
You can always chase a dream but it will not count if you never catch it.
When you stop chasing the wrong things you give the right things a chance to catch you.
